Lugar muy seguro y tranquilo.

name: Hotel Campestre Acuarela
description:
Such a beautiful place to camp. Not an official campsite, but the owner loves camping and is very willing to accommodate you. We had a spot next to the clean swimming pool and bathrooms. 
Good restaurant, very kind staff.

name: Jungle Joe’s
description:
Hotel and  restaurant with views of Santa Marta and sorrounded by nature. Delicious food made by a friendly chef. Vegetarian option. We arrive here in a tour with guide walking in the mountain 15 min. We had lunch and they explained about local nature, animals and they gave us a tour of the hotel and explained how it was built with “Guadua” (local bamboo). And cacao process explanation
We didn’t stay. 35000/ night with breakfast

name: Parqueadero de tierra
description:
Calm and quiet parking place. Close to the centre of the town and a street with a supermarket and shops with fruit and vegetables. At the nearby Hostal Monkey, you can get a shower and bathroom for 10.0000COP and we both had a shower.
.....
 Parqueadero tranquilo y silencioso.
Cerca del centro del pueblo y de la calle de supermercado y tiendas de verduras y frutas.
Queda cerca el hostal Monkey, alquilan el baño por 10.000 COP y nos duchamos los dos.

name: Casarodante Colombia - Los Francés
description:
Workshop for manufacturing, repairing and improving travel vehicles and general mechanics. we do heavy truck mechanics and welding (steel, aluminum, stainless etc).
WhatsApp: 322 34 000 30
FB:  Taller casa rodante colombia - los francés

name: Lavadero Autos entrada San Jose
description:
Restaurant, mini market, parking, sports camps. Free showers.
.....
El lugar ofrece servicio de restaurante, tienda, lavadero autos y gran zona de parqueo, además cuenta con campo deportivo. Además duchas gratis

name: Villa Lilia agroecouristico
description:
Place in nare guaviare in the Amazon jungle where you can swim with pink dolphins! Excellent attention! They must separate before coming!
Call 3177721739
Belisario cifuentes

Lugar en nare guaviare en la selva amazónica en donde podrán nadar con delfines rosados! Excelente atención! Deben separar antes de venir!
Llamar a 3177721739
Belisario cifuentes

name: Road from Puerto Lopez to Barranca de Upia.
description: There is a ferry (not shown on maps me)17k per vehicle.

name: Kristazul
description: filled our tank with a hose

name: Terpel Gas station
description: Large parking area. Not too much traffic during night time.

name: Playa verde
description:
we spent more than 30 days in this place. very quiet place to park any type of vehicle next to the River Fish (crystal clear river of fresh water). in summer time the place is totally free, if you are only going to park.
for the other services, call Luis Fernando 3108600933
.....
pasamos más de 30 días en este lugar;muy tranquilo para estacionar cualquier tipo de vehículo al lado del río Pescado(río cristalino de aguas frescas)en época de verano es totalmente Gratis si solo va a estacionar.
para los otros servicios el señor se llama Luis Fernando 3108600933

name: Santiago de las Damas
description:
We stayed 3 nights in this place, very quiet to spend the night. allows all kinds of vehicles. the parking lot is Free, if you are going to camp, Santiago provides the kitchen services, wfi, bathrooms and showers.
.....
 Nos quedamos 3 noches en este  lugar, muy tranquilo para pasar la noche entra todo tipo de vehículo, si el parqueadero es Gratis, si va hacer cámping Santiago presta los servicios de cocina,wffi,baños y Duchas.

name: Piedras de  Moler
description:
very good site. camping beside river.  car cost 15 xpers.
....
muy  buen  sitio  acampada   lado  rio  asado   entra  carro    costo   15 xpers 
ir en samana  no  finde

name: Agualinda  Apia
description:
ecofriendly agualinda apia trail. you can park overnight and go out to the pretty trail.
....

sendero  eco  carder  agualinda  apia se  puede  parquear  pasar  la  noche  y   salir al  sendero bonito

name: Lienzo Hostel
description:
Araracuara Hostel is a meeting place that provides accommodation and an experience to travelers and locals. In addition, it is a space of cultural exchange and rest.
.....
Araracuara Hostel es un sitio de encuentro que proporciona alojamiento y una experiencia a viajeros y locales.. Además, es un espacio de intercambio cultural y descanso.

name: Misión Médica
description: Zona Digital frente a Misión Médica. Free wifi in front of medical building. It was fast and I was able to join to my virtual meetings, rejoining every hour. Only had one interruption. Very poor neighborhood, kids comment “Casa Rodante”. no one came to disturb.

name: Finca cerca a Wisirare
description:
We asked the owner (in spanish) for permission to park inside the farm, there are many trees that provide shade, the place is very cool and quiet, there are several animals; pigs, chickens, ducks, dogs, cats, horses, cows; the managers of the farm are very friendly, a very cozy place, next to the Wisirare park is a reserve of alligators to visit is beautiful, and 30 minutes down the road you get to Orocue.
--
Nosotros pedimos permiso al dueño para aparcar dentro de la finca, hay muchos árboles que aportan sombra, el lugar es muy fresco y tranquilo,  hay varios animales; cerdos, gallinas, patos, perros, gatos caballos, vacas; los encargados de la finca son muy amables, un lugar muy acogedor, al lado queda el parque Wisirare una reserva de caimanes para visitar es hermoso, y a 30 minutos por la carretera se llega a Orocue.

name: Quiet Beach Camp
description: We arrived on a Sunday at 3pm. Packed with people (mainly chilled out families). By 5pm they had all gone, completely deserted and very quiet night next to the sea. Locals friendly, police okayed camping here. Local said only busy on weekends. We left midday Monday and still not one person on the beach. Wish we’d stayed an extra day. Fast cell service too (claro and Movistar)

name: Parque principal
description:
We recommend parking in the plaza de Marulanda in front of the ovine cooperative. In this place you find free water and WiFi (you must register to make it work) The people of the place are very friendly. You must visit the Fabian museum and in the cooperative observe the process of the wwod.



Recomendamos parquear en la plaza de marulanda frente a la cooperativa ovina. En este lugar encuentras agua y wifi gratis ( debes registrarte para que funcione) La gente del lugar es muy amable. Debes visitar el museo de Fabian y en la cooperativa observar el proceso de la Lana.

name: Jarrinapi
description:
Comfy bungalow with water 6-8 12-13 18-20, electricity from 18 to 22. In front of the beach, clean and beautiful. 
(I checked other options and This was the best for 40000 pp)

name: Finca junto a Wisirare
description: The access road is unpaved, the farm is next to the Wisirare biopark, and 30 minutes from Orocue, the very friendly owner allowed us to stay for several days, the managers were very friendly, a very cozy place.

name: Parque principal Pore
description:
The main square of Pore, quiet place, close to the police station and one block from the river and commerce.
.....
La plaza principal de Pore, lugar demasiado tranquilo, cerca a la estación de policía y a una cuadra del rio y del comercio.

name: Puerto Nuevo
description: Just passed and saw a few guys with their mobiles. Free

name: Parque Principal Pore
description:
Moderator Note: A nearby Place is reported by the same User. The description is the same but the co-ordinates are different. Maybe the next User can clarify!
The park is quiet, safe, with a lot of history, it is close to the police station and a block from the river.
.....
El parque es demasiado tranquilo, seguro, con mucha historia, queda cerca la estación de policía y a una cuadra el río.

name: Lavadero La Guaca
description:
I left my motorhome here for 4 days during my trip to Alta Guajira they have space I their car wash. Juan Carlos and Francisco brothers were very friendly.
Cameras and family lives here taking care of the car every day. 
Before leaving,, they washed my motorhome because it has normal dust from previous trip and stay.

name: Parqueadero y hospedaje detrás de estación de gasolina
description:
7000 per night in a parking lot of trucks, Jeison allowed me to connect to power 110V (in the parking across the street only have 220V) 
They have rooms for truck drivers. I slept in my motorhome with open windows due hot weather. Not quiet, trucks coming and leaving making noise and at 3 am a car crashed came and park behind my motorhome surrounded of many men talking and talking woke me up. 
Felt safe for one night.

name: Manai: Cascadas del Chupal
description:
Wonderful place next to the beautiful waterfalls (7 in total!). Quiet campsite, great climate, popular during the weekends but in a relaxed way. Surrounded by lush green mountains and views. Clean bathrooms (still partly under construction), and meals can be obtained at walking distance (5 minutes, didn’t try it). 
Friendly staff, let me park our car with rooftop tent on a nice spot not meant for cars. 
It’s on a dead end road but worth the detour (10 k from Laguna El Tabacal, well marked). 
Price:  COP 50 000 pp pn (March 2024) including access to the waterfalls.

name: Laguna Piña de Corozo
description:
Beautiful place to connect with nature, 14 kilometers from urban area, in the Vijagual village, 11 hectares of water to appreciate a variety of animals such as Chigüiros, Caimans, Birds, Monkeys among others, there is a Camping service of $ 10,000 Colombian pesos (Approx 2.5 Dollars) and parking, sale of drinks, for food service you must notify before arriving cel: 3212118410.
---
Hermoso lugar para conectar con la naturaleza, a 14 kilómetros de Pore casco urbano, en la vereda Vijagual, 11 hectáreas de agua para apreciar variedad de animales como Chigüiros, Caimanes, Aves, Monos entre otros, hay servicio de Camping $10.000 pesos colombianos (Aprox 2.5 Dólares) y parqueadero, venta de bebidas, para servicio de alimentación hay que avisar antes de llegar cel: 3212118410.

name: Rio Ariporo
description:
The access road is 15 minutes from the village. arriving at the river, there is a small bay where the road ends and it is the entrance to the river, where the dump trucks that carry stones come down. you can go down to the river road but you need a high vehicle because of the amount of large stones. we go down to the river in the van and at night we are located in the bay, very quiet and safe at night.
.....
El camino de acceso es destapado a 15 minutos del pueblo, llegando al río hay una pequeña bahía donde se  termina el camino y es la entrada al rio, por donde bajan las volquetas que llevan piedras, se puede bajar al camino del rio pero se necesita un vehículo alto por la cantidad de piedras grandes, nosotros bajamos hasta el río en la camioneta y en la noche nos ubicamos en la bahía, muy tranquilo y seguro en la noche.

name: Lago Azul Paz de Ariporo
description:
Beautiful lake. You can swim, canoe or walk around it. Entrance 2000$. The owner let us stay the night for 10,000$

Hermoso lago, allí se puede nadar, pasear en canoa o hacer caminata por sus alrrededores, la entrada cuesta 2000$, nosotros hablamos con el propietario para poder pasar la noche, nos cobraron 10.000$ por aparcar.

name: La Rivera Playa
description:
20000 pp, bathroom (clean), open showers, power, allowed me to refill water tanks, swimming pool, kioskos, terrace. Suitable for big and heavy trucks 

Rooms 160000 double w/ air conditioner
3182452129

name: Fuel station TEXACO
description: Showers free, store meals, parking free.

name: Balneario las Palmas
description: Swimming pool, camping, showers, farm, toilets, parking. All four dollars, twenty four hours.

name: Terpel Hotel Saman
description: Service Station. hotel and parking. My motorhome (sandero Stepway Renault) $1 dollar, shower fifty cent.

name: Caño Vainilla ( Rio Muese)
description:
Beautiful quiet place, surrounded by nature, next to the river. The access road is unpaved. you have to cross a small river before you arrive. We stayed 4 days, it is located next to a farm, the manager was very friendly and highlighted to us the safeness of the place.
......
Hermoso sitio tranquilo, rodeado de naturaleza, al lado del rio. La vía de acceso es sin pavimentar hay que atravesar un río pequeño antes de llegar. Estuvimos 4 días, está situado al lado de una finca, el administrador fue muy amable y nos resaltó lo seguro del lugar.

name: Parque Hato Corozal
description:
We asked the police where we could park, we were told that anywhere in the main park was ok, the place is quiet and safe, close to commerce, we stayed 2 days, friendly people.
.....
Preguntamos a los policías donde podíamos aparcar, nos dijeron que cualquier lugar del parque principal estaba bien, el lugar es tranquilo y seguro, cerca a comercio, nos quedamos 2 dias, las personas amables.

name: Parqueadero 24 horas Bello Horizonte
description: 8 days parking $64000. Family living there. Not allowed to sleep in camper.

name: Ecoparque Los Chicos
description:
Beautifully situated, quiet campsite with excellent views. Good facilities, such as open air kitchenettes with electricity, swimming pool with natural (cold) water, playgrounds, clean bathrooms (cold showers) and good food. Very sweet and helpful owners.  Plenty of animals walking around such as lamas and flamingos. Close to Bogota. 

Only warning: during long weekends it can become very busy, also with young people enjoying loud music. Policy is to separate campground in quiet family area and other for young people.

name: camión de gas
description:
Mr Orlando has a little truck that does the gas load (argentina connection). He's a Vida gas distributor. call him and arrange a place to pick up and deliver. it can be here in Florida or in Pereira. call before because this place is a parking lot. He just passes by here. he's not permanently here. 
573217035561
.....
Sr Orlando tiene un camioncito que hace la carga de gas en garrafa argentina. Es un distribuidor de vida gas. llamarlo y combinar lugar para retirar y entregar. puede ser acá en la Florida o en Pereira. llamar si o si antes porque este lugar es un parqueadero. El solo pasa x acá. no está acá permanente. 
573217035561

name: cascadas Cubugon
description: Parking in front of the entrance of the waterfalls, quiet and safe place, they charged us 5000 pesos for parking, including bathroom and water, the entrance to the waterfalls costs 2000 pesos and for crossing the river in the boat they charge 2000 pesos per person. --- Parqueadero frente a la entrada de las cascadas, sitio tranquilo y seguro,nos cobraron 5000 pesos por aparcar, incluído baño y agua, la entrada a las cascadas cuesta 2000 pesos y por atravesar el río en el bote cobran 2000 pesos por persona.

name: El Mirador
description:
On the road to Soberanía, is a viewpoint in a restaurant and hotel, it also works as a stopper for trucks, ample space for parking, we had lunch on the first day, the owner allowed us to stay overnight for free, so we stayed for 4 days.
--
Sobre la vía de la Soberanía, es un mirador hay restaurante y hotel, funciona también como parador de flotas y camiones, amplio espacio para aparcar, nosotros almorzamos el primer día, el dueño nos permitió parquearnos para pernoctar sin costo, nos quedamos 4 dias.

name: La Casona Hotel
description:
Not recommended location not friendly people and expensive 25000 only parking and 45000 parking including access to the hotel (not bathroom no shower) they gave me power and nothing else... 
I talk to the manager telling him it was too expensive and he was very unfriendly and refuse to reconsider prices...
I got stuck here because My family book rooms here, we were traveling together to Minca and government order lockdown and quarantine... had to spend two days here...

name: Deyi’s House
description:
Deyi is a lover of campers and motorhomes, she have a huge house in a compound located in a nice and safe neighborhood with big space to park my heavy motorhome and allowed me to connect to power, refill water tanks and use wifi. Also help me with contacts in terminal with a proper place to empty dirty water tanks.
She is very friendly and help me to organize my trip in Barranquilla, drove me to the zoo and came with me to Bocas de Ceniza. 
She have one fluffy cat and two playful dogs.

name: Centro de servicio Vitermo
description: Next to the terminal, they washed the bathroom with soap and chlorine, $10000 but finally I negotiated in $7000. They have a huge wash area for buses

name: Calle del instituto
description:
Street parallel to the main, flat and quiet. Silent at night and safe.
We were both allowed to shower for $5,000 at the El Balcón de Oriente Hostel in the main square. Also wash clothes for $5,000 and dry for $5,000.
There are several cafes in the main with wifi, for example Providencia coffee (very rich espressos and halygrant).
People are gentle and kind.
.....
Calle paralela a la principal, plana y tranquila. Silencioso de noche y seguro.
Nos dejaron duchar a los dos por $5.000 en el Hostel El Balcón de Oriente de la plaza principal. También lavar la ropa por $5.000 y secar por $5.000.
Hay varios cafés en la principal con wifi, por ejemplo café Providencia (expressos y granizados muy ricos)
La gente es gentil y amable.

name: Seaside
description:
I found a very good place close to the sea right beside a cabin between two very safe hotels good lighting. we asked if we could stay overnight and we were told that we should leave before 7 am
.....
encontré un muy buen lugar Serca al mar justo bajo una cabaña en medio de dos hoteles muy seguro buena iluminación preguntamos si se podía amanecer nos dijeron que antes de las 7 debíamos desocupar por qué es un establecimiento

name: Finca Los Mangos
description: Excelente place to take a break, the cabin is perfect for a family or a group of friends. It’s far of the noise but close enough to the beach.

name: Willis al carbon
description: Excellent restaurant. Allows you to spend the night in a tent or house car. beautiful landscape, excellent attention

name: Colegio Integrado Los Santos
description:
In this point the red of internet is Free.
Name: “Zona+Digital Mejor País”

name: Servicio Brio
description: Fuel station. Brio. Bathroom and water

name: Parqueadero de Robinson
description:
I find this place because I had been visiting a friend near by. We agreed Parking 20000 per night and 3000 for power use and refill water tanks
Bad smell coming from the nearest lagoon


Encontré este lugar porque había estado visitando a un amigo cerca. Acordamos estacionar 20000 por noche y 3000 para uso de energía y recarga de tanques de agua
Mal olor procedente de la laguna cercana

name: Stadium Municipal Pachito Pallares
description: A park with water and bathroom, parking only in morning.

name: Baños Mercado Campesino Bathroom
description: A Market in Los Santos. Bathrooms, shower and potable water. Parking in the day.

name: Via laguna del Cacique
description:
A few kilometers from Cacota, north of Santander on the way to laguna del Cacique, space next to a park and a school, quiet place with viewpoint towards the village, friendly neighbors.
.....
A pocos kilómetros de Cacota norte de Santander camino a la Laguna del Cacique, espacio junto a un parque y a una escuela, lugar tranquilo y silencioso con mirador hacia el pueblo, vecinos amigables.

name: Plaza de Paicol
description:
We parked in the opposite corner of the entrance to the village of Paicol. There is security and tranquility. Chorrera Waterfall is a 5-minute walk away. There is a restaurant near the square "MILL" that make menu for $6000. People will be surprised by tourists passing through their village!
.....
Parqueamos en la esquina contraria de la entrada al pueblo de Paicol. Hay seguridad y  tranquilidad. Hay la cascada de la Chorrera que queda a 5 minutos caminando.
Hay un restaurante cerca de la plaza "MILL" que hacen menú por $6000. 
A la gente le sorprendre a gusta que pasen turistas por su pueblo!

name: Between Police station and School
description: After checking the entrances in the closest parking lots where it was too low for my motorhome, the Police were very kind and allowed me to stay with them. The captain came to visit inside and see. To thank them, I give a package of peanuts with dried fruit.

name: Las Palmeras
description:
Ana Rosa and her sons are friendly and work hard in their ecohostel, clean and organized. 
I spend one night 60000 single room with shared bathroom with running water. (I was the only person in this rooms and I didn’t had to share the bathroom) 
They have solar power and station to charge mobiles or other devices to 110V

Call to the mobile 3176387922 Ruth or 
To book dive session Diana +57 (300) 835-1837 or Fernando (310) 677-4566 from www.bloopdive.com

Ana Rosa y sus hijos son amables y trabajan duro en su ecohostel, limpios y organizados.
Pasé una noche 60.000 en habitación individual con baño compartido con agua corriente. (Yo era la única persona en estas habitaciones y no tenía que compartir baño)
Cuentan con energía solar y una estación para cargar teléfonos móviles u otros dispositivos a 110V

Llame al móvil 3176387922 Ruth o
Para reservar la sesión de buceo Diana +57 (300) 835-1837 o Fernando (310) 677-4566 desde www.bloopdive.com

name: Parqueadero hotel isla del encanto
description:
30000/ day, I left my motorhome one night and day to visit Isla Grande. 
Security 24/hrs. They request owner authorization to park here as an exception. It was the only option for my motorhome because it have open roof

30000 / día, dejé mi casa rodante una noche y un día para visitar Isla Grande.
Seguridad 24 hrs. Solicitan la autorización del propietario para estacionar aquí como excepción. Era la única opción para mi autocaravana porque tiene techo abierto.

name: Parador Ovejas
description:
4 rooms. Only 1 available at the time. 30,000cop for 2 people. Shower and toilet in room. Restrooms, hotel. 
.....
hotel, banheiro e cachoeiras três reais.
Hotel, Restaurante y servicio de Duchas. $2.000 servicio de ducha

name: Taller de El Chicanero Fibra de vidrio
description:
Francisco repaired the back fence of my motorhome, he was very busy with other jobs but he fixed the damage that I had done to my motorhome in narrow the streets of the center.
Call (314) 605-8032 Francisco Javier 

Francisco reparó la valla trasera de mi autocaravana, estaba muy ocupado con otros trabajos pero arregló el daño que le había hecho a mi autocaravana en las estrechas calles del centro.
Llame al (314) 605-8032 Francisco Javier

name: El Orquideal
description:
Texaco gas station, hotel, restaurant, toilets; showers (half dollar), parking free trucks, motor home and auto. Salesman Luis very friendly.  FIVE STARS.

Estação de serviço TERPEL, hotel, restaurante, banheiro e (cachoeiras três reais). estacionamento gratuito, administrador muito amigável Luís.

name: Paqueadero Jaime Bertel
description:
It is a simple parking lot with a family living inside, sand floor, it is fine for large trucks. And allowed me to stay in my motorhome ( I checked other options around town and they don’t allowed to slept inside) 
$ 15000/24 ​​hours allowed me to use the bathroom, shower and use the electricity.
Jaime was kind and helped me organize a tour to the islands.
They have chickens, hens and dogs.
One block from the sea Next to the local market and four blocks from the main cathedral.
no nice neighborhood. I asked if it was okay to walk around and Jaime told me to be alert and keep safe my mobile and bag.
Jaime mobile (320) 521-7223

Es un estacionamiento sencillo con una familia viviendo adentro, piso de arena, está bien para camiones grandes. Y me permitió quedarme en mi casa rodante (verifiqué otras opciones en la ciudad y no pueden dormir adentro)
$ 15000/24 ​​horas me permitieron usar el baño, la ducha y la electricidad.
Jaime fue amable y me ayudó a organizar una gira por las islas.
Tienen gallos, gallinas y perros.
A una cuadra Del Mar, Junto al mercado local y a cuatro cuadras de la catedral principal.
no es un buen vecindario. Le pregunté si estaba bien caminar y Jaime me dijo que estuviera alerta y mantuviera a salvo mi móvil y mi bolso.
Jaime móvil (320) 521-7223

name: San Luis de Palenque, orilla del río Pauto
description: Es un lugar a la orilla del río Pauto, al frente de una finca, muy tranquilo y seguro, las personas de la finca son amables y nos colaboraron con lo que necesitábamos.

name: Maria’s
description: Wonderful newly built accommodations, clean rooms with private bathrooms, hot water, wifi, comfortable beds with clean, nice bedding. There is a shared kitchen for use and plenty of space for parking. Maria, the host, is very lovely and kind. I paid 55,000 COP per night. Walking distance to the town center and also the entrance to the Cueva de Nitro. Maria : +57 315 8411626

name: Estacion BIOMAX Los Pinos BOHIO
description:
Beautiful viewpoint, sale of juice and fruits, breakfast and bathroom and shower service.

Hermoso mirador, venta de jugos y frutas, desayunos y área para parqueo gratis, servicio de baño y ducha.

Lindo Mirante, venda de sucos e frutas cafés da manhã e serviço de banheiro e ducha.


Aleyda = su propietaria (owner)

name: Puente Vargas
description:
leaving the town towards the village area passing Puente Vargas and taking the path to the left, near the river, very quiet and safe, the neighbors are very pleasant 

saliendo del pueblo hacia la zona veredal pasando Puente Vargas y tomando el camino a mano izquierda, cerca al rio, muy tranquilo y seguro, los vecinos muy agradables

name: Finca Agroturistica Las Margaritas
description:
A very nice and calm Coffee Farm with a very welcomed owner. 
We enjoyed this place so much. The owner told us everything from his place, the coffee, the animals, etc. 
W payed 20.000 COP per person and night. Inclusive was the pool and coffee all day long. 
If you reserve this place the owners making sure that you will be the only guest so you have your own big space.
We definitely recommend this place! 

It's not easy to go to the camping place, we recommend 4×4 and definitely not for big rigs!

name: TEXACO
description:
Good place, they suffer from water but if you have your portable shower they lend you the space, better fuel here because when you go to the department of Cauca the difference is $ 2,000 pesos more.

Buen lugar, sufren por agua pero si tienes tu ducha portátil te prestan el espacio, combustible mejor cargar aca pues al pasar al departamento de Cauca la diferencia es de $2.000 pesos más.

name: Centro Vacacional la Bocana
description:
Swimming pool 2,80 Mts and 0,60 cms pp 1,50 dollar.
Parking motorhome 3 dollars. (camping)
showers, bathroom free.
Owner Henry Flores cellular 3148172521

name: Isla Fuerte
description:
Arrive by boat, walking tour to Morgan's Cave Island, harvest mangoes, walking tree, bigger tree, beach, snorkel, I saw starfish and sloth bears !!!

Call Victor (322) 519-7017

Llegue en bote, recorrido a pie a Morgan's Cave Island, cosecha de mangos, árbol para caminar, árbol más grande, playa, snorkel, vi estrellas de mar y osos perezosos.

name: Parqueadero José (entrenador de Gallos de Pelea)
description:
Jose is a fighting cock trainer, his parking lot next to the sea and near the port of Paso Nuevo to take boats to Isla Fuerte
$ 10,000 / day $ 10,000 / night $2000 wifi and 
allowed me to connect to electricity. I stayed one night, the next day I could see how he trained his roosters.


Jose es entrenador de gallos de pelea su parqueadero al lado del mar y cerca al puerto de Paso Nuevo desde el que salen las lanchas hacia Isla Fuerte
$10000/dia $10000/noche.
me permitió conectarme a la electricidad. estuve una noche, al dia siguiente pude ver como entrenaba a sus gallos.

name: Playa alta
description:
We had a very quiet night here. el senor Danilo and his family are very kind.
.....
pasamos una noche muy tranquila el señor Danilo y su familia son muy amables.

name: Quebrada la Piñalera
description:
We spent two nights in this place, very quiet. beside the hills and crystal waters.
....
pasamos dos noches en este lugar, muy tranquilo y al lado una quebrada de aguas cristalinas.

name: laguna el Juncal
description:
We stayed next to the lagoon in a very quiet place with a very friendly family, provide camping services and a canoe tour of the lagoon, restaurant service. the way to get here is by unpaved road. no short vehicles enter, preferably 4*4 although we were ok in the sprinter.
...
Nos quedamos al lado de la laguna en un sitio muy tranquilo con una familia muy amable, prestan servicios de camping y recorrido en canoa por la laguna, servicio de restaurante.
la via para llegar  es por carretera destapada no entran vehículos bajitos, preferiblemente 4*4 aunque nosotros subimos en la sprinter

name: Parqueadero Ronda del Sinu
description:
$8000/day $8000/night. Allowed me to connect to power and use wifi. Just in front of Ronda del Sinu and touristic places in downtown. 
.....
$ 8000 / día $ 8000 / noche. Me permitió conectarme a la energía y usar wifi. Justo en frente de la Ronda del Sinu y lugares turísticos del centro.

name: Cancha de Fútbol
description:
I asked at the police station where I could spend the night and they recommended this soccer field to me, next to it I found the Hotel Mi Remanso and they allowed me to connect to the light and use Wi-Fi, bathroom and shower. $20000/day It is very close to the sea. I saw soccer players and volleyball on the beach. The first night I slept well, at the beginning of the curfew of the second day the police came to remove the players from the soccer field, and they told me that it was not allowed to park overnight, that they had given me the wrong information, but I spoke with them and convinced them that I would not find a place so late without breaking the curfew and they allowed me to stay one more night with a commitment to leave early in the morning
.....
Pregunté en la comisaría dónde podía pasar la noche y me recomendaron esta cancha de fútbol, ​​junto a ella encontré el Hotel Mi Remanso y me permitieron conectarme a la luz y usar wifi, baño y ducha $20000/dia. Esta muy cerca del mar. Vi futbolistas y voleibol en la playa. La primera noche dormí bien, al inicio del toque de queda del segundo día la policía vino a sacar a los jugadores de la cancha de fútbol, ​​y me dijeron que no estaba permitido estacionar durante la noche, que me habían dado la información equivocada...., pero hablé con ellos y los convencí de que no encontraría lugar tan tarde sin desacatar el toque de queda y me permitieron quedarme una noche más con el compromiso de salir temprano en la mañana.

name: La Ceiba
description:
A few minutes from the village of Durania, is a recreational center, offering drinks, snacks, billiards, grilling stove, To enter is free - only pay for consumption, rental of games or fire pit. the owner allowed us to park for the night, ample parking space.
.....
A pocos minutos del pueblo de Durania, funciona como centro recreacional, ofrece bebidas, snacks, cancha de tejo, billar, fogones para asados, junto a la quebrada la legia, la entrada no tiene costo, solo el consumo, alquiler de juegos o fogón, el dueño nos permitió aparcar para pasar la noche, amplio espacio de parqueo.

name: Parque principal Donjuana
description:
In the main park, very nice and quiet place, the cops said there was no problem staying overnight there, at night super quiet, in the park is the police station, the church, soccer field, and some commerce.
.....
En el parque principal, lugar muy bonito y tranquilo, los policías dijeron que no había ningún inconveniente en pernoctar allí, en la noche super tranquilo, en el parque se encuentra la estación de policía la iglesia, cancha de fútbol, y algún comercio.

name: Parqueadero y lavadero Carlos Mario
description:
I left my motorhome (large RV) indoors during my visit to Capurganá, Carlos Mario was kind and I report daily the status of my motorhome.

Dejé mi autocaravana (RV grande) bajo techo durante mi visita a Capurganá, Carlos Mario fue amable y reporto diariamente el estado de mi autocaravana

name: Parqueadero La Curva EDS Zeuss
description:
$ 10000/24 ​​hrs. They don't allow sleeping inside the vehicles normally, but after speaking with the owner and manager, they made an exception for my motorhome.
They allowed me to connect to electricity $ 5000 / day.

$ 1000/24 ​​hrs. No permiten dormir dentro de los vehículos normalmente, pero después de hablar con el propietario y el gerente, hicieron una excepción para mi casa rodante.
Me permitieron conectarme a la electricidad $ 5000 / día

name: Juglares en el Palmar
description: Grassy ground; nice view but poor open air banjos. You can rent nice looking hats. But don't know the prices. For motorhome it is 20k ppn. You can buy drinks and snacks at the kiosk and walk along the beach to the volcan. It was closed but at the beach there is mud enough for fun.

name: Las mazamorras de Uraba
description:
I loved the banana brownie, delicious, it is a place to visit in Chigorodó. I brought banana cake, banana arequipe, dehydrated banana covered with chocolate and banana cookies! I loved the Colombian industry made by women heads of the family, taking advantage of the products of the banana region. They also have boxes made with the fiber of the banana plant and molas, ideal for a gift.

Me encantó el brownie de banano, delicioso, es un lugar al que hay que visitar en Chigorodó. llevé torta de banano, arequipe de banano, banano deshidratado cubierto con chocolate y galletas de banana! Me encantó industria colombiana hecha por mujeres cabeza de familia, aprovechando los productos de la región bananera. También tienen cajas hechas con la fibra de la planta del banano y molas, ideales para un regalo.

name: Baras'h
description:
Hostal and Campground with good parking for Overlanding. Sitting area, kitchen, laundry service, restrooms, wifi. Camping 15kpp and rooms available at 25kpp. Hot showers are available on request inside the house.
Mr. Epaminondas Barajas 321-819-5859

name: Hotel Puerto Mar
description:
I asked at the police station if I could spend the nights in my motorhome and they recommended this place. Just in front of the tourist pier and the Puerto Mar hotel. The owners of the hotel and restaurant were very friendly. Helped me to organize my trip. Allowed me to connect to power.
.....
Luz Elena Galvis (311) 687-5817 --- Pregunté en la Estacion de Policia donde podía pasar las noches en mi autocaravana y me recomendaron este lugar. Justo en frente del muelle turístico y el hotel Puerto Mar. Los dueños del hotel y el restaurante fueron muy amables. Me ayudaron a organizar mi paseo por la zona! Me permitieron conectar a la energía.
Luz Elena Galvis (311) 687-5817

Tener presente que como es un restaurante no cobran el estacionamiento, pero si el consumo y servicio, los precios no son imposibles pero tampoco económicos

name: Adrenalina Extrema
description: It is a very nice place where to do extreme sports like canopy, torrentism, bike aereal, hammock aereal. all of them very fun. 40.000COP each activity. They also have beautiful glampings to stay here at night. TEl: 3154765559 you can get with your van and park upside. in the parking 200 m

name: Football field
description: Asked the police if we could put the tent behind their quarters on the football field. They were cool.

name: Hotel Saman del Rio Yopal
description: Very nice Hotel with pool, private showers.Lots of space for all kind of rigs. Electricity behind the Hotel.30kpp.

name: Pull out
description: two possibilities to stay next to the track if you were sent away from the official  places. 3777m elevation.

name: Hiliera de la montagna
description: Potable Water in Boletas and 20 liter garafons

name: Refugio Annapurna
description: Established campsite right in front of the famous Suesca cliffs. They also provide all the equipment and instructions for rock climbing, trekking and mountain cycling.

name: Terpel San Pedro
description: $6000 /night, parked between two trucks. Quiet during night. Trucks start making noise very early in the morning.

name: Parqueadero EDS Hotel La Variante
description:
Guarded parking $ 5000, quiet at night, they have bathroom and shower next to the restaurant and hotel. They allowed me to connect to power for an additional $ 5000. 

Estacionamiento vigilado $ 5000, tranquilo por la noche, tienen baño y regadera al lado del restaurante y hotel. Me permitieron conectarme a la energía por $ 5000 adicionales

name: Tomotores Del Llano
description: A workshop dedicated to working on Toyotas. Run by a very knowledgeable Venezuelan Mechanical Engineer. They can offer original spare parts or generic if you need them.

name: La Fuente Heladería Artesanal
description: Is a traditional restaurant famous for their ice creams with variety of fruits from all the country. Very recommended!!!

name: Portus
description: On the lake. Water access. Restrooms with Shower (cold). Sitting area, electrical outlets, BBQ, sink. Good place for tents or overlanding SUVs. Wi-fi. ±573194621207

name: Puerto Rico
description: Beautiful next to the river campsite surrounded by nature. The best host/owner you can meet just one hour from Bogotá. Bernardo will guide you to fulfill your interest whether it is kayaking, trekking, canopy, birding. Pet friendly. All the amenities such as open air showers, comunal kitchen, electricity. You can enjoy a great bonfire and just lay down and stargazing or moonbathe. if you enjoy nature, birds, butterflies, all kind of bugs, and the majestic sound of the river, this is the place for you.

name: Checkpoint with Corrupt Cops
description: Stopped at checkpoint here and got shook down by police looking for a bribe. Tried a couple of different tactics before getting me on the date of insurance (which, lesson learned, starts the day after you pay for it… ugh). If you’re reading this, don’t make the same mistake I did and give cops along this road a reason to extort a bribe from you.

name: Park and sleep
description:
calle 145 x carrera 53. 
There are many places to park for free. there are no sanitary basic services but local surveillance provides safety, not much traffic and friendly people around.

name: Hostal la Campesina
description: A quaint finca home with private rooms and shared bathrooms. Lovely spot outside of the town, surrounded by cacao farms and other fruit trees- lots of birds and other animals around. A very family experience, with many people around on the weekend (especially Sunday). There is also the camping area, acampando al caravanas, nearby. I paid 35,000 per night, including coffee in the morning. Camping sites, including tent rental, is 20,000 per night (cheaper if you have your own camping stuff). I went into town for food but you could ask about purchasing meals. We had a bonfire out at the camping zone last night, after a beautiful sunset. Contact Diego Quijano for reservations +57 305 4694990

name: Bahia Pomarrosos
description:
We stayed overnight for 10 days in this place near the Salazar River, a lovely place, very quiet, safe neighbors, very friendly very cool weather. there are several places to visit.
.....
Estuvimos pernoctando por 10 días en este lugar cerca al río Salazar, un lugar encantador, muy tranquilo, seguro los vecinos del sector muy amables el clima muy fresco hay varios sitios para visitar.

name: Parque principal de Tamara
description:
This park is very calm, safe and clean with lots of room for parking.
.....
El parque es muy tranquilo, seguro y limpio, cuenta con una bahía amplia para estacionar.

name: Río Tocaría, ruta libertadora Nunchia
description:
Tocaría river beach, with crystal clear waters and very close to the Bolívar stone monument in Nunchia Casanare, close to the town, very safe and quiet. 

Playa del río Tocaría, con aguas cristalinas y muy cerca al monumento de la piedra de Bolívar en Nunchia Casanare, cerca al pueblo, muy seguro y tranquilo.

name: Bandido Hostel
description:
New excellent hostel only opened a year ago that has everything you need. Safe parking for 2+ motorcycles or several  bicycles. I moved from Candelaria.
Quiet and safe area. Friendly staff. Good Internet. I think there is street parking too for vehicles. Chapinero area is only 5-10 mins walk. Lovely dorms with private curtains.Hot showers and new kitchen. Netflix ...
It was 18,000 cop for a mixed dorm when I was there. Booked through Booking.15,000 for female dorm.

name: Brisas del Magdalena
description: Clean, comfortable room with fan for $18,000. Bicycle allowed in room. Restaurant serving breakfast and dinner. Recommended.

name: Finca llano lindo vereda las delicias
description: It is a place near the Chitamena river, where Don Edgar and his family allowed us to spend several nights, they shared with us more of the life of the plains and mountains, they are very friendly and hospitable, a safe, beautiful and quiet place. --- Es un lugar cerca al lado del río Chitamena, donde Don Edgar y su familia, nos permitieron pasar varias noches, compartieron con nosotros más de la vida del llano y montaña, son muy amables y hospitalarios, lugar seguro, bello y tranquilo.

name: Aqua Fresca de la Montaña
description: The correct place to get water. In back of gas station parking lot. $5000COP

name: Turkolandia
description: Tons of pizza offered in Palomino. This place for one makes really really good pizza. I ate here several times.

name: Imari Café
description: Café with absolutely amazing food and coffee. Not super accessible from the highway but even if you are driving through stop here. You will not regret it. Had the Indian style chickpea sandwich and it was incredible. Coffee was exceptional as well. Wish I’d been spending more time in Santa Marta just so I could eat here more.

name: Fenix servicentro - Zeuss Gas Station
description: Best car wash I have had since Cancun MX. Plan some time. Very extensive washing incl. cleaners. Underbody 3x! Solvent +  soap and hand brush + 3rd rinseEngine bay incl. solvent and air gun drying. Also good place for oil change, lots of different grades and brands. Tires and so on.

name: Next to Rio
description: Nice little spot next to a river. Really quite at night and like the town itself safe. Not suitable for big rigs. Claro service. No Tigo anywhere but free wifi at main park.

name: Wild camp at roadside with creek
description: Nice spot for wild camping. Level ground beside the road and a small cristal clear creek.

name: Panadería La Especial
description: Excellent bread and pies! Even German Stollen available.

name: Next to El Mesón de los Viajeros
description:
It is a place on the road, next to the restaurant El mesón de los Viajeros, in this place you can buy delicious meals, drinks and desserts, they allowed us to spend the night and they lent us the bathroom, we spent a quiet night and we felt safe, the people of the place very friendly


Es un lugar sobre la carretera, al lado del restaurante El mesón de los viajeros, en este lugar se puede comprar deliciosas comidas, bebidas y postres, nos permitieron pasar la noche y nos prestaron el baño, pasamos una noche tranquila y nos sentimos seguros, las personas del lugar muy amables.

name: Granja Raku
description:
Raku Farm is a place with cabins. It is just starting to receive campers. it still does not have many facilities, however the view, the place and its owners, make the space very cozy. The weather is quite cold.
.....
Granja Raku es un lugar de cabañas que apenas se está iniciando en la recepción de campers. aún no cuenta con muchas facilidades, sin embargo la vista, el lugar y sus dueños, hacen que el espacio sea muy acogedor. El clima es bastante frío.

name: Finca de Sandra
description:
They took care of us very well here. We were installed with LED light on a tangerine tree right next to where we camped. They lent us Rimax table and chairs. The farm has a swimming pool, and pool table.  The cost is 20000 PP for camping
.....
nos atendieron muy bien. Nos instalaron luz LED en un árbol de mandarina justo al lado del lugar donde acampamos. Nos prestaron mesa y sillas Rimax. La finca cuenta con piscina, mesa de billar y rana.  El costo es de 20000 PP para el camping

name: Skale Peregrino
description: Finca with room for rent and very cute small space to put a camper. Facilities on request. Better call before coming here. We paid 50‘ COP for 2 adults and one baby including breakfast. Call +573217475413

name: Camping Culumpulos
description:
We parked in the bay of the campsite, talked to the owner (Juan) and as an exchange or volunteer, he allowed us to stay for several days.
Cold showers and water service from a spring.
Tent rental and camping area.
Beautiful view towards old Gramalote and new Gramalote.
.....
Aparcamos en la bahía del Camping, hablamos con el propietario (Juan ) y a modo de intercambio o voluntariado nos permitió quedarnos varios días.
Servicio de duchas frías, baños y agua de un naciente .
El negocio ofrece alquiler de carpas y zona de camping.
Hermosa vista hacia Gramalote viejo y Gramalote nuevo.

name: Parqueadero Grande
description:
It is a very central place to park, Don Alex and his family are very formal and attentive. we stayed three nights.
.....
Es un lugar muy central para estacionar,  don Alex y su familia son muy formales y atentos. nos quedamos tres noches.

name: parque  principal
description:
peaceful place to spend the night, prettey scenery. Any kind of vehicle can get here

un lugar muy tranquilo para pasar la noche, con un paisaje muy bonito por la vía principal.
40km de los cuales 15km sol alfaltados, llega cualquier tipo de vehículo.

name: Hotel Campestre Luna de Miel
description: Nice big campground with a beautiful view. Shower, toilets and big pool available. Great place and warm climate.

name: Safe Place
description:
We spent three nights in this place, parked next to a peasant house where they gave us natural water. A very quiet place.

Esapanol
pasamos tres noches en este lugar, estacionados al lado de una casa campesina dónde nos regalaron agua natural. u. lugar muy tranquilo.

name: Hot sun arroz
description: Great little cheap Asian rice place in an otherwise pricey town. Ask for their salsa picante..

name: Pueblo Fantasma
description:
a village inhabited by 5 families. There are some beautiful ruins, a very quiet place to spend the night with very friendly people.
the route in good condition.
....
un pueblo habitado por 5 familias.Quedan unas ruinas bonitas,un lugar muy tranquilo para pasar la noche con gente muy amable.
la ruta en buen estado pero muy pendiente.

name: RESTAURANTE LOS ALMENDROS
description:
Saleswoman ROCIO OSORIO, Love motorhome, parking free, toilets free and shower free. cellphone 3184961743
--
ATENDIDO POR ROCIO OSORIO, AMANTE motorhome, PARQUEADERO GRATUITO, servicios sanitarios gratis y duchas, celular 3184961743
--
Direção ROCIO OSORIO, muito generosa, paraquedas de motorhome grátis.

name: Bahía Iglesia Lourdes
description:
In the main park, in the bay next to the church, we asked and we were told that we should request permission in the mayor's office that is in the same park. They were very friendly. We were issued a written authorization to be able to spend the night in the motor home for two days in the bay, very safe quiet place, trade nearby, pleasant weather.
.....
En el parque principal, la bahía junto a la iglesia, preguntamos y nos dijeron que debíamos solicitar permiso en la alcaldía que queda en el mismo parque, allí muy amables nos expidieron una autorización escrita para poder pernoctar en casa rodante por dos días en la bahía, lugar muy seguro tranquilo, comercio cerca, agradable clima.

name: Cumbal-La Ortiga
description: They offer food service, bedrooms and guidance to the Cumbal and Chiles volcano. the family is very friendly and kind. Phone number. 3206406736 Wilson - 3206412824 Homero

name: Black Sheep Hostel
description:
A hostel in Poblado where I could stay with my motorhome. I just parked on the street in front of the hostel. The reception is open 24 hours. They have hot showers, kitchen, toilets, tables, WiFi.
I paid COP 20'000 for one night.
You can contact them with WhatsApp Message +57 317 5181369.

name: Villa Del Carmen
description: Beautiful little restaurant/bar/campsite/small 2 room hotel with HUGE TV’s and A/C. The owner says he’s building a pool soon and a little petting zoo with monkeys,etc. No set price yet for camping. We ate dinner and camped for free. Clean bathrooms with a toilet seat. He offered use of shower in hotel room. We had 3 G signal with Claro. No wifi yet. Big and wide rigs might not fit through the entrance.

name: solo frenos 3J
description:
-we changed the brake pads, very good price and excellent service.
ask for Beto.

nos cambiaron las pastillas de los Frenos, muy buen precio y excelente servicio.
preguntar por Beto.

name: parque principal
description:
-we spent two nights in this place.
a very quiet place

pasamos dos noches en este lugar.
un lugar muy tranquilo.

name: parque principal
description:
-we spent two nights in this place.
a very quiet place

un lugar muy tranquilo para pasar la noche.
nos quedamos dos noches.

name: plaza principal
description:
-a place of passage to spend the night,quiet and safe with very friendly people.
it has a path to a very nice waterfall.

un lugar de paso para pasar la noche,tranquilo y seguro con personas muy amables.
tiene un sendero a una cascada muy bonita.

name: Zona de Camping el Hoyo
description:
Very spacious place, road hotel, safe and quiet.
we talked to the gas station manager and he was very friendly. 
.....
Lugar muy amplio, funciona hotel de carretera, seguro y tranquilo.
hablamos con el encargado de la estación de gasolina y fue muy amable.

name: plaza principal
description:
we spent three nights in this place. 
 very quiet and friendly people. next to the church there is a sports center with showers and public toilets. --- pasamos tres noches en este lugar. 
 muy tranquilo y la gente amable. al lado de la iglesia hay un polideportivo con duchas y baños públicos.

name: Pre-Paid Wi-fi
description: This business provides a one-time use PIN for internet. Not so fast but enough to do searches, flight check-ins and book hostels.

name: Conexion Amazonas Jungle tours
description: Tour company with the best schedules in the area, highly recommended!

name: Pura Vida Jungle Lodge
description: Pura Vida is a sustainable and non invasive lodge surrounded by 5 acres of untouched Amazon Forest located in Puerto Nariño-Amazonas, in Colombia. Bioconstruction and ecological house located 5 min walking from main street of Puerto Nariño.

name: Playa Hawai
description:
Highly recommended !!!

The parking area for campers is large, and in front of the camping sites have bathrooms, showers, kitchen, dining tables available.
They provided water, energy.
The place has a huge pool, a slice of water, a lagoon with kayaks and water bikes. Additionally a games room with billiards, volleyball court, games room. And we had meetings in the stadium, restaurants and green areas.

I came for the first camper meeting in Colombia organized by Campers Club Colombia, we were more than 70 campers and campers (happy to see many motorhomes and meet more travelers and suppliers !!!) hopefully every year in June or July. We paid $35000 pp. definitely worth it! 

websites:
https://camperstravelcolombia.com/
https://playahawai.com/

Muy recomendado !!!

El área de estacionamiento para campistas es grande, y frente a los sitios de acampada tienen baños, regaderas, cocina, mesas de comedor disponibles.
Proporcionaron agua, energía.
El lugar cuenta con una enorme alberca, rodaja de agua, laguna con kayaks y bicicletas acuáticas. Adicionalmente una sala de juegos con billar, cancha de voleibol, sala de juegos. Y tuvimos reuniones en el estadio, restaurantes y áreas verdes.

Vine para el primer encuentro de campistas en Colombia organizado por Campers Club Colombia, éramos más de 70 campistas y campistas (¡¡¡felices de ver muchas casas rodantes y conocer más viajeros y proveedores !!!) ojalá sea cada año en Junio o Julio. Pagamos $35000 día por persona, definitivamente los vale!

name: Next to Town Hall
description:
We parked next to the Town Hall. Very quiet, there's WiFi in the Park (intermittent), as well as water and electricity supply on the park's posts. 



Nos parqueamos en la calle justo al lado de la alcaldía. Es un lugar muy tranquilo, en el parque hay wifi ( intermitente) también hay una toma de agua y energía en los postes del parque.

name: Hotel Yopal (Hospedaje)
description: Cheap little hotel across from truck wash. An option if you get stuck in the mountains and it’s getting dark. Only 20K big hard bed with a fan and TV. Lots of road noise until late. It’s ok for the price..

name: Balneario El Cristal
description:
We spoke with the owner of the spa and he allowed us to spend the night in the parking lot of the site.
It is located next to a stream with clean and crystalline water. the site is very quiet at night. --- 
Hablamos con el dueño del balneario y nos permitió pernoctar en el parqueadero del sitio.
está ubicado al lado de una quebrada con agua limpia y Cristalina. el sitio es muy tranquilo en las noches.

name: Caño Cunumia, San Juan de Arama
description: It is a stream near the main park of San Juan de Arama, it is clean to bathe, spend a good day next to the river and has a bay to spend the night. --- Es un caño cerca al parque principal de San Juan de Arama, es limpio para bañarse, pasar un buen día al lado del río y cuenta con una bahía para pasar la noche.

name: Hotel Ciudad Bonita
description: After getting some new tires at Makrollantas we decided on a few days of rest. Nice hotel for the price. Area is not the best in town but it’s safe. Pool is cold but showers are hot and A/C is great. Only $35 USD. 3 restaurants and a bar. Go to Cacique mall and walk around. There’s a parqueadero just 4 blocks north on the right same street # 55 with room for big rigs. Not many people seem to stay in Barranquilla but we found people really nice. If you get stuck here this is a great option.

name: Finca Omega
description: Small apartment type hotel. Just 30 minutes south of Socorro. Very peaceful brand new place with small pool and horse barn. We got the largest room with one King and one queen bed. The other rooms are smaller and cheaper. They said 80K but we bargained for 60K. Far enough away from the highway to sleep like a baby. Highly recommend if it’s getting dark and you need a good nights sleep. Enjoy!

name: La Floresta
description:
We talked to an inhabitant of the village and he guided us to this point. The site is very quiet and safe.  Access to the creek, surrounded by nature. Almost no one travels here because the old road ends.
.....
Hablamos con un habitante del pueblo y él nos guió a este punto, el sitio es muy tranquilo y seguro tiene acceso a la quebrada, rodeado de naturaleza, no transita casi nadie debido a que allí finaliza la carretera antigua.

name: Milla de Oro Hotel
description: Super clean new build hotel 120,000 COP per night for double w air con and breakfast off the main road set back from fuel station, with really nice quiet rooms, and Buddha/yoga vibe decor. Friendly staff, restaurant, fast WiFi and parking on site, IBIS hotel next door and other restaurants around. Staff helped us order a pizza delivery as we arrived late! - not the cheapest but great for a peaceful night close to Turbo (recovery night for us after boat rides around the Darien Gap!).

name: Termales de Rivera Comfamiliar
description: They have hot water swimming pools and an area for camping. Very traditional place to visit near Neiva.

name: Hotel Brio
description: Clean little hotel. A little overpriced at 100K, but it’s clean and has a small restaurant. It’s a typical Colombian truck stop with truck traffic all night. Still managed to sleep OK since we were so tired after driving down from El Cocuy. Not a lot of options around here.

name: Parqueadero
description: This place looked a bit nicer than some of the other ones in town. Has a narrow entrance but our 11 foot tall pickup camper fit. Plenty of room once inside. Don’t think they’d allow you to camp, but we didn’t ask. There’s a family living on site. They charged us 50K for 2 days while we stayed in a hotel. Lots of cheap hotels in this town.

name: Hotel Verona
description: Cute little hotel on a quiet dead end street. Only a few blocks from the main plaza. Paid 100K a night with breakfast included. They gave us one of the only 2 rooms out front with a small balcony. Really enjoyed it here. There’s even street parking out front if you have a smaller type vehicle. Enjoy..

name: Collaborative bike repair shop / Taller Colaborativo
description: Mauricio is one of the best bike mechanics you can find. He is a bike traveller himself so he will know what you need. Repair and shop. Great guy.

name: Ksa Andina
description: an excellent place to rest, there are bathrooms with hot showers, restaurant, camping area, wifi, green areas, parking ... the service is excellent

name: Parqueadero next to main plaza
description: Nice big opening gate and no height restriction here. Didn’t park so don’t know price or details. Lots of other places but this looked very quiet and empty.

name: El Tigre La tranquilidad
description:
We spend two nights here, they asked $6000 parking cost. Wonderful view! 
Offered Bathrooms, Shower, 
Restaurant

name: Ferry Villavieja - Aipe
description:
We crossed the Magdalena River in  motorhome using the new Ferry between Villavieja and Aipe
$30000 motorhome big truck
$20000 small van and vehicles
$5000 motorbike

Cruzamos el río Magdalena en autocaravana utilizando el nuevo Ferry entre Villavieja y Aipe
$ 30000 autocaravana grande 7m
$ 20000 camionetas y vehículos pequeños
Moto $ 5000

name: Puerta de Orión
description: Es un camping en la entrada de la puerta de Orión, cuenta con servicio de camping, duchas, baño y restaurante, las personas son muy amables y serviciales, aquí mismo se paga la entrada para hacer la caminata y conocer la puerta de Orión, pagamos Cop10.000, Usd 3.oo por nuestro Camper, $5.000 pp Usd 1.00.

name: Parque Principal Prado
description:
We spend one night here, free wifi and power. A little noisy.

Pasamos una noche aquí, wifi gratis y energía. Un poco ruidoso.

name: Parqueadero Represa Prado Mar interior de Colombia
description: They asked $15000 / 24 hrs. Offered Power. Big rig friendly

name: Rio
description:
Lugar plano junto al río, es amplio para parquear.
Estuvimos 3 noches pernoctando muy tranquilo, las personas de las fincas cercanas son muy amables, hay poco tránsito por la zona.

name: El Guajiro Restaurante
description:
Parking free at El Guajiro Restaurant/ ATTENDED by Mrs. Minelva, receives motorhome, sells breakfasts from $8,000; lunches $12,000, with meat, mojarra and Catfish $14,000. Free bathrooms.
.....
Parking Free El Guajiro ATENDIDO por la señora Minelva, recibe motorhome, servicio de baños de carrera, muy colaboradores los esposos. Baños gratis, suficiente almuerzo, se están iniciando en el negocio de restaurante. Parada temporal.

name: Paraiso Termal
description:
Thermal water pool
311 5060379 321 9948301

They do not allow you to stay in the parking lot inside the motorhome.
Pool $ 22000 pp
campsite $ 50000 pp includes swimming pools
$ 200000 room includes breakfast
Excursions 311 5060 379
@paraisotermal

Piscina de agua termal
311 5060379 321 9948301

No le permiten permanecer en el estacionamiento dentro de la autocaravana.
Piscina $ 22000 pp
camping $ 50000 pp incluye piscinas
$ 200000 habitación incluye desayuno
Excursiones 311 5060379
@paraisotermal

name: Riverside & hills
description:
Perfect flat ground spot alongside the river. Quiet, off the main road at end of a small track from the bridge, flat area possibly a turning circle. Looks like a crossing ford point but no one crossed here and there is a bridge just up the river. We camped in our tent with our motorbike, space for 2-3 overland vans. Only hills around, sound of roaring river, had lots of rain but ground was fine! 

Great road up here from Villavicencio (took the back road through Medina), much nicer than the main roads which had lots of roadworks. Medina road had a few very rough cobble patches but easy doable on motorcycle or 4x4. (locals use their sudans!).

name: Quebrada San Roque
description:
We stayed overnight for 4 nights next to the creek, little trafficked very quiet.
We spoke with the owner of the farm next door and he told us that he was safe, he was aware of us, very kind. 
Estuvimos pernoctando por 4 noches al lado de la quebrada, poco transitado muy tranquilo.
Hablamos con el dueño de la finca de al lado y él nos indico que era seguro, estuvo pendiente de nosotros, muy amable.

name: Parada Donde Willy
description: I usually don’t add restaurants but this place has great food with very nice views off the highway and plenty of parking. Enjoy!

name: Finca Moniyamena
description:
It is a farm of awareness with nature, a place of rest, nature trails and a starting point to visit natural attractions in the region. You can also leave the motor home safely, to visit Caño Cristales and many beauties that the Colombian plains offer. Book by phone. + (57) 3114815498.
The price is 20,000 dpi. --- Es una finca de sensibilización con la naturaleza, un sitio de descanso, senderos naturales y punto de partida para visitar atractivos naturales en la región. También se puede dejar la casa rodante de manera segura,  para visitar Caño Cristales y muchas bellezas que ofrecen los llanos de Colombia.  Reservar telefónicamente. +(57)3114815498. 
El precio 20.000 ppp.

name: Pachamama
description:
In addition to camping, they offer tent rentals, parking, restaurant and accommodation. There is river, waterfall and hiking trails.

Ademas de camping, ofrecen alquiler de carpas, estacionamiento, restaurante y alojamiento. Hay rio, cascada y senderos de caminata.

name: Plaza de las banderas
description:
We spent six days in this place that is characterized by its spaciousness and tranquility. It is located at the entrance of the village and is quite safe to spend the night.
.....
Estuvimos seis días en este lugar que se caracteriza por su amplitud y tranquilidad. Está ubicado a la entrada del pueblo y es bastante seguro para pasar la noche.

name: parque principal
description:
A quiet place to spend the night. We stayed one night
---
Un lugar tranquilo para pasar la noche.
nos quedamos una noche

name: lugar sobre la via muy bonito
description:
Place to spend the night. We stayed next to a peasant house.
quiet place with good sense of security.
----
lugar para pasar la noche.nos Quedamos al lado de una casa de campesinos.
lugar tranquilo con buena sensación de seguridad.

name: Parador Portal de Cauca
description: Large restaurant with good cheap food. We ate dinner and parked in front of the restrooms for the night. Quiet except for road noise but off the highway a bit. If you go a few kilometers north you can park next to the tunnel road maintenance building on the north side off the road on the old roadway. This is right before the daily road closure from 11 a.m. to 9 p.m. Monday through Friday. Your only other option is a crowded dirt road bypass that adds a few more hours to your drive.

name: VIDRIOS Junior EU
description:
They helped me to fix the windows and make sure they sealed properly.
They repair windows in buses and cars. 
Juan and Nilson were friendly and with their staff they got the job done quickly.
Juan (320) 419-5576
Nilson (310) 339-0481

Me ayudaron a arreglar las ventanas y asegurarse de que sellaran correctamente.
Ellos reparan vidrios de buses y automóviles 
Juan y Nilson fueron amables y con su personal hicieron el trabajo rápidamente.
Juan (320) 419-5576
Nilson (310) 339-0481

name: La BocaToma
description:
5 minutes from the town, The Firemen told us the place and how to get there, The place is spacious for parking, quite shady with trees, it is next to the river and next to the entrance of the Jagua aqueduct, it is very pleasant and quiet, you We spoke to those in charge of the aqueduct, they said we could spend the night there; we stayed 3 days.


A 5 minutos del pueblo, Los Bomberos nos indicaron el sitio y como llegar, El lugar es amplio para parqueo, bastante sombra de árboles, queda junto al río y junto a la entrada del acueducto de la Jagua, es muy agradable y tranquilo, le hablamos a los encargados del acueducto, dijeron que podíamos pernoctar alli; nos quedamos 3 días.

name: Finca ecoturística La Joya
description:
It is an ecotourism farm where they provide the service of camping, cabins, restaurant, swimming pool, BBQ area, with recreation areas, showers, bathrooms, large green areas, and hammock area, it is an ideal place for campers. Jhon Martinez is the host, cell phone 3204889372. It is a safe and quiet place, the attention received has been very special, highly recommended for us who live on the road.

*******************************************************

Es una finca ecoturística donde prestan el servicio de camping, cabañas, restaurante, piscina, zona de BBQ, con zonas de recreación, duchas, baños, amplias zonas verdes y zona de hamacas, es un sitio ideal para campistas y camperitas, atendiendo por su anfitrión Jhon Martinez, celular 3204889372, un lugar seguro y tranquilo, la atención recibida ha sido muy especial, súper recomendada para nosotros los que vivimos en ruta.

name: Cerro de Guadalupe
description:
The view of the city is very good. It has a statue of the Virgin of Guadalupe. The church is at its busiest on the first Sunday of each month, and the hill is frequented by cyclists on Tuesdays, Thursdays and weekends. It is difficult to park at the top as there are few parking spaces, the road is very narrow and has many curves. There is public transportation from Caracas with 6 and taxis $ 2500 - $ 3000 per person.

La vista de la ciudad es muy buena. Tiene una estatua de la Virgen de Guadalupe. La iglesia está más concurrida el primer domingo de cada mes, y la colina es frecuentada por ciclistas los martes y jueves. Es difícil aparcar en la parte superior ya que hay pocas plazas de aparcamiento, la carretera es muy estrecha y tiene muchas curvas. Hay transporte público desde Caracas con 6 y taxis $ 2500 - $ 3000 por persona.

name: Mercado de las pulgas de Usaquen
description:
Lively weekly outdoor market with entertainment and stalls selling arts, crafts, food and gifts. Surrounded by gourmet restaurants, boutiques and malls. 

Animado mercado al aire libre semanal con entretenimiento y puestos que venden artesanías, comida y regalos. Rodeado de restaurantes Gourmet, boutiques y centros comerciales

name: Junto al rio
description:
Beautiful place 5 minutes from Becerril, the people of the town guided us, at the edge of the road there is a short path that leads to the river, it is close, easy access, we parked next to a farm, we spoke with the owners and they said that we could spend the night there.

ESPANOL
Hermoso lugar a 5 minutos de Becerril, las personas del pueblo nos guiaron, al borde de la vía hay un camino destapado corto que conduce al río, es cerca, fácil acceso, nos parqueamos al lado de una finca, hablamos con los dueños y dijeron que podíamos pernoctar allí.

name: Centro Canino Cruz Roja Bogota
description:
Canine Nursery / Hotel, veterinarian, Ethologist, Canine obedience courses, very friendly and professional

Guardería Canina / Hotel, Veterinaria, Etóloga, Cursos de obediencia canina, muy amables y profesionales.

name: Road Views
description: Stunning dirt road along river between valley. Slow and steady with dirt sections mix with tarmac but so worth it. Two up on motorcycle with full pack.

name: Biblioteca
description:
With the permission of the Librarian and the police, we were able to park in this quiet place. We spent two nights there without any problems. The site has no services. If you come through Chocontá, the road is very bad and full of potholes. However, the landscape is very beautiful.

******************************************

Con el permiso de la Bibliotecaria y la policía pudimos estacionar en este tranquilo lugar. Pasamos dos noches allí sin ningún problema. El sitio no posee servicios. 
Hay que resaltar que si vienes por Chocontá la carretera es muy mala, llena de baches, aunque el paisaje es muy bello.

name: Cerca a la plaza
description:
We parked one night next to this little park and it is pretty quiet at night.
*******************************************
Nos estacionamos una noche al lado de este pequeño parque y es bastante tranquilo durante la noche.

name: Termales Agua Caliente Suesca
description:
Indoor pool of hot springs It is advisable to make a reservation for the entrance 3508030206
$ 18000 adults
$ 12000 children up to 1.35 m height
The road is uncovered but in good condition and the road has beautiful landscapes!

ESPANOL
Piscina cubierta de Aguas termales es recomendable hacer Reservación para la entrada 3508030206
$18000 adultos 
$12000 niños hasta 1.35 m altura
La vía es destapada pero en buen estado y el camino tiene hermosisimos paisajes!

name: Cancha de fútbol
description:
The police advised us to spend the night in front of the soccer field. It is a quiet and safe town, we rest very well.

La policía nos aconsejó pernoctar frente a la cancha de fútbol. Es un pueblo Silencioso y seguro, descansamos muy bien.

name: Camping Caña y Café
description:
This is a family run finca with a very well maintained grass area. Very quiet and peaceful, a few meters from the van we could grab some oranges for breakfast. The family is very nice and welcoming. 
Wifi, hot shower, 8000pp

name: Hotel La Cabaña
description: Place near the main Road, very cheap, parking to big truck. Frendly people and supermarket 24 hours. Roms with Air AC, price per night USD 10 (2 person).

name: Cucunuba Park
description: Parking in the main park, quiet after midnight, nice town.

name: Bahía Rio Manaure
description:
Parking bay next to the entrance of the Danta hostel and the Manaure river, very quiet and safe place, the climate and the village are very pleasant. We paid 3000 pesos to park 24 hours.
....
Bahía de parqueo junto a la entrada del hostal danta y del río manaure, lugar muy tranquilo y seguro, el clima y el pueblo muy agradable.
pagamos 3000 pesos por parquear 24 horas

name: Waterfall
description: Amazing dirt track, OK for cars and bikes but steep, bumpy and bit rough at times. Lovely views, takes you to waterfall (see Cascada Indians wildcamp spot). Entrance to road quite hidden. No signpost off main road between two roadside trucker hotels (Hotel San Jose Real & Rio Hotel).

name: Auto Frenos SAM
description:
The mechanics helped me to check and calibrate the brakes, it required changing rear tire retainers, bearing and hammer or padlock (which I got originally with Mercedes Benz previously although they also have spare parts).
General greasing $ 12000
Tire lowering $ 30000 

Me ayudaron a revisar y calibrar los frenos, requirió cambiar retenedores de llanta traseras, rodamiento y martillo o candado (que conseguí original con Mercedes Benz previamente aunque también tienen repuestos) 
Engrasado general $12000
Bajada de llanta $30000

También trabajan muelles, cardam,
Jhonatan fue muy amable

name: La Samaria
description: This place is very Good, the owner is very friendly, authorized set up my tent in a construction. The place is located to side of river.

name: Scanner Electricidad Automotriz y Electrónica
description:
John was very friendly and professional 
He Changed the turn signal lever, windshield, horn, high beams.
Camera and reversing camera installed in the cab.

ESPANOL
John Electricista fue muy amigable 3234903925

Cambió la palanca de los intermitentes, parabrisas, claxon, luces altas.
Cámara y cámara de marcha atrás instaladas en la cabina

name: Rio Guatapuri
description: Wide parking bay next to the Guatapuri river, it is opposite the police station, next to the province park with  a variety of restaurants, During the day there are people who take care of the vehicles, a donation  is voluntary, very quiet at night , potable water tap available in the bay.

name: Cartagena: Mila pastelería
description: Delicious café with breakfast and one of the best cakes in town. A bit expensive but nice experience.  WiFi available

name: Brasa Manaurera
description: Good restaurant just by the main square. Regional  food, daily lunchs, delicious "yuca" and meats.  Parking

name: Track off a track pull in
description: Poor quality steep track, but good spot for the night to get off the farmers field tracks. Woke up to views of the mountains and cool stone carving (we rode for 2 hours bobbling along a cobble loose rock track from Charala looking for a place to wild camp, virtually nothing the whole way as every river and side road fenced off). Quiet night only one cowboy and horse came by.

name: A orillas del río Lucía, Mesetas, Meta
description:
Spot next to the river, a bay area to pass a quiet night
Lugar al lado del río Lucía, hay una bahía amplia con muro de contención, para pasar la noche lugar tranquilo.

name: Charco azul
description:
20 mtr high waterfall, you can swim in the clear water. restaurant there too.

Casacda charco azul, cascada de 20 metros de altura, se puede bañar aguas cristalinas, hay servicio de restaurante.

name: Agua Linda,
description:
A natural [lace with waterfalls and rivers, we spent an quiet and secure night there. The owner known as Don 'Pico de Oro' is very friendly and helpful

Un lugar muy natural con cascadas y ríos, pasamos una noche muy tranquila y segura, Don "pico de oro" el dueño así lo conocen es muy amable y atento.

name: Refugio Salomón
description:
En el corregimiento Termales Nuquí convenientemente ubicado muy cerca a las termales.
El hotel tiene Sencillas y limpias habitaciones, zonas de esparcimiento con hamacas y un restaurante con vista al mar desde el cual pudimos ver delfines!!!
Nos atendieron súper bien el Señor Salomón y la Sra. Ernestina.
Diariamente Nos consentían con bebidas luego de cada travesía. Y me encantó la arepa de coco que nos dieron al desayuno! 
Se siente muy seguro y familiar. 
Nos ayudaron a reservar tour a la ensenada de Utría, al avistamiento de ballenas, búsqueda de desove de tortugas, vista de la vía láctea y caminata a la cascada de los cuatro encantos. 

Reservas 
3226772542
3155279501
3162242568

name: CHANA (vegan restaurant)
description:
Very tasty vegan meals, most of them with an Asian twist.
Totally worth it. Hard to find such a quality vegan meal for such a price.

The street is closed off so the bars can have a terrace on the street in front. Especially lively during weekends.

name: Caño Cristalina
description:
It is a place next to the crystal clear water pipe that passes over a stone slab, you can bathe, to spend the night or spend the night you have to be careful in winter or with rain there may be floods, a quiet place, on the way to the waterfalls of looms. crystal.
---
Es un lugar al lado del caño de agua cristalina que pasa sobre una laja de piedra, se puede bañar, para pernoctar o pasar la noche hay que tener cuidado en invierno o con lluvia pueden haber crecientes, lugar tranquilo, camino a las cascadas telares de cristal.

name: Zippy Tour
description:
Tour through commune 13, super interesting because they tell the history of the commune and how it has become a tourist destination and how that is reflected in the beautiful murals that adorn the commune
The tour starts at the San Javier metro station and ends at this viewpoint.

Reserves 3148787775

@zippytour

Tour por la comuna 13, súper interesante pues cuentan la historia de la comuna y cómo se ha transformado a ser un destino turístico y cómo eso se ve reflejado en los hermosos murales que adornan la comuna
El tour inicia en la estación del metro San Javier y termina en este mirador. 

Reservas 3148787775

@zippytour

name: Martinata restaurant
description:
Small local restaurant with lots of juices and delicious food. We are vegan and and ask for a “bandeja paisa” but without the meat - they gave us extra beans and salad. It was so good! 

They also have a lot of juices. The place is very clean and nice too. Well ventilated! 

Also - they are little mercadito/tiendas right in front of this place. Fruit veggies and other stuff is available. We got a big bag of oats and bananas to cook breakfast for less than $1.

name: Balneario-Restaurante La Porra
description:
This is a family run restaurant-hotel with a pool and a big green area. Camping is 40,000 and a private room is 60,000 (for two people). We were a bit hesitant to go down the steep little road that takes you from the main road to the entrance of the hotel (biking down takes 1 minute, very quick). Once we got down we were kindly welcomed, saw the room and decided to stay. 

We are on bikes and this was a perfect place to rest before the big climb to Jericó the next morning.  La porra was great! Simple and affordable - very comfy. Bikes fitted perfectly in our room, we had a fan, a tv, two beds and a private bathroom. The pool is dead during the week so veryyyyy quiet night of rest :)

Food: the restaurant has a lot of food during the weekend but during the weekdays the cook is out so they order food from another place down the main road (Martinata Restaurant) and a motorcycle will bring it to you. The place is called Martinata and is literally 5min walking (slow) down the main road. I wrote a small review for that place too, it was great food!

name: Plaza de Restrepo
description:
We stayed a night in the principal plaza. Quiet and safe.

Pasamos una noche en la plaza principal. Restrepo es un pueblo tranquilo y el lugar es seguro.

name: La Tienda de Caldea
description:
Very cute little place right on the road. It has jugos naturales, café, tinto, sodas, alcoholic drinks, food (including empanadas with potatoes and a few other vegan/vegetarian opcions!)

They also sell a few snacks (chips/chocolate). There is a big green area for parking and a little rack where we locked our bikes. This was such a great stop!

name: Alemautos Mercedes Benz
description:
I brought our camping rig to the Dealership to do a job of insulating the cabin floor, checking the electrical connections, oil leaks. 
The work is quality according to the price. They only work with original spare parts and because they are so far removed from commercial points they can take longer than expected.
.....
Traje a Paticaliente al Concesionario para que hicieran un trabajo de aislamiento del piso de la cabina, revisión de las conexiones eléctricas, fugas de aceite. 
El trabajo es es calidad acorde con el precio. Solo trabajan repuestos originales y por estar tan retirados de puntos comerciales pueden tomar más tiempo de lo esperado.

name: Hospedaje Central
description:
